DOC.brief_summary: People overweight and/or obese usually insulin resistant risk type 2 diabetes . However , research show overweight and/or obese people remain insulin sensitive healthy despite weight . The investigator hypothesise insulin-sensitive overweight and/or obese people maintain insulin sensitivity metabolic health time . The investigator also hypothesise preservation insulin sensitivity determine key metabolic factor .
DOC.brief_title: Insulin-sensitive Obesity : Lessons From Longitudinal Data
DOC.criteria: Participation previous SiDIRAD ( 1 ) EXCESS ( 26 ) study . Willingness give write informed consent willingness participate comply study . Pregnant and/or lactate woman .
